org.gearvrf

Class GVRShaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRShaderManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GVRMaterialShaderManager, GVRPostEffectShaderManager

    public class GVRShaderManager
extends GVRHybridObject
    Manages GearVRF shaders for rendering scene objects. Get the singleton from GVRContext.getMaterialShaderManager().

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject

        GVRHybridObject.CleanupHandlerListManager, GVRHybridObject.NativeCleanupHandler

    • Field Detail

      • mShaderTemplates

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends GVRShader>,GVRShaderId> mShaderTemplates
        Maps the shader template class to the instance of the template. Only one shader template of each class is necessary since shaders are global.

    • Constructor Detail

      • addShader

        public int addShader(java.lang.String signature,

                     java.lang.String textureDescriptor,

      • getShader

        public int getShader(java.lang.String signature)
        Get the shader manager ID for a shader based on its signature.

        The shader signature uniquely defines a native shader in the system. The shader index returned uniquely identifies this shader to GearVRF.

        Parameters:
        signature - shader signature generated by GVRShaderTemplate
        Returns:
        integer shader ID

      • getShaderType

        public GVRShaderId getShaderType(java.lang.Class<? extends GVRShader> shaderClass)
        Retrieves the Material Shader ID associated with the given shader template class. A shader template is capable of generating multiple variants from a single shader source. The exact vertex and fragment shaders are generated by GearVRF based on the lights being used and the material attributes. you may subclass GVRShaderTemplate to create your own shader templates.
        Parameters:
        shaderClass - shader class to find (subclass of GVRShader)
        Returns:
        GVRShaderId associated with that shader template
        See Also:
        GVRShader
